Family comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jeff Garlin, Steve Zahn and Anjelica Huston.(n)

programme.title: Free Willy
programme.desc: A troubled youngster befriends a captive killer whale while working at a marine park. However, their friendship looks set to be short-lived when he learns the park's greedy owners plan to kill the animal, forcing the boy into a race against time to release the creature back into the ocean. Family drama, starring Jason James Richter, Lori Petty and Michael Madsen.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: We Still Kill the Old Way
programme.desc: A former gangster returns to London after 30 years living in exile in Spain when he receives word of his brother's murder. Angered by the brutality of a new generation of criminals who have taken over his territory, he gets his old partners in crime back together to avenge his sibling and restore order to the streets. Gangster drama, starring Ian Ogilvy and Allison Doody.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: In a move to identify suspected hijackers, an undercover police officer infiltrates the high-octane world of illegal late-night street racing by rival gangs. He is befriended by a champion driver, but when he also forms a bond with the racer's sister, he is pitched into a conflict of loyalties. Thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth.

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: Two South African police officers, one black and one white, investigate the murder of a teenage girl. The case brings to light the lingering consequences of apartheid, and forces both men to face up to their own roles in their country's brutal history. Crime drama based on Caryl Ferey's novel, with Forest Whitaker and Orlando Bloom.

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
programme.desc: Two brothers living in New York's Chinatown in the 1980s rise quickly through the ranks of a local gang. When their organisation clashes with a rival, the siblings are targeted by a hard-bitten cop who is determined to clean up the streets. Crime drama, starring Ray Liotta, Justin Chon and Kevin Wu.

programme.title: Go With Me
programme.desc: A woman returns to the isolated logging community where she grew up, and is stalked by a former cop, who now heads up a criminal organisation in the area that operates above the law. She resolves to take a stand against him, seeking the aid of a retired logger and his sidekick. Thriller based on Castle Freeman Jr's novel, starring Julia Stiles, Anthony Hopkins, Alexander Ludwig and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: A disgraced former cop is arrested by the FBI for illegal street racing, but his one-time colleagues offer him freedom in exchange for going on an undercover mission. Teaming up with an old racing friend and a customs official, he has to infiltrate and bring down a drug-trafficking operation. Thriller sequel, with Paul Walker reprising his role from The Fast and the Furious alongside Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes and Cole Hauser.

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Detectives Riggs and Murtaugh team up with a reformed small-time crook and a tough, female internal-affairs investigator to track down a former policeman trafficking impounded weaponry to the bosses of organised crime. Action thriller sequel, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci and Rene Russo.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A washed-up former hostage negotiator returns to regular police work, but later finds himself forced to draw on his old skills in a bid to save a crooked accountant's children, who have been taken prisoner in their own home by a gang of psychotic delinquents. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Ben Foster and Jonathan Tucker.

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman.

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson.(n)

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Four city friends look forward to a weekend canoeing trip in America's Deep South. However, their adventure turns into a nightmare when menacing rednecks come down from the nearby hills and subject them to a shocking assault, forcing the men to take extreme action to save their lives. John Boorman's thriller based on James Dickey's novel, with Burt Reynolds, Jon Voight, Ronny Cox, Ned Beatty and Bill McKinney.(n)

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two 10-year-old boys find a seemingly abandoned police car in a glade and decide to take it for a joyride. However, the obsessive local sheriff is prepared to go to any lengths to get the vehicle back, and the youngsters find themselves drawn into a deadly game of cat and mouse. Crime thriller, starring Kevin Bacon and Camryn Manheim.(n)

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning.(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow.(n)

programme.title: Camino
programme.desc: A photographer ventures deep into the jungles of Colombia to document a group of missionaries. However, when she witnesses the leader of the group committing a horrific crime, she faces a battle for survival to make it back to civilisation with the evidence before his followers have her killed. Action thriller, starring Zoe Bell and Nacho Vigalondo.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.(n)

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott.(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone.(n)

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Chastity Bites
programme.desc: A 500-year-old murderer maintains her eternal youth by bathing in the blood of virgins, and sustains her supplies by leading a double life as a conservative campaigner for sexual abstinence. A teenage blogger discovers her secret, and tries to prevent her friend from becoming the latest victim. Comedy horror, starring Allison Scagliotti and Louise Griffiths.

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Three backpackers travelling across Europe hear of a Slovakian inn where their every hedonistic desire will be met. However, they discover they have been lured into the clutches of wealthy depraved businessmen who pay for the chance to torture people to death. Horror, starring Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson and Eythor Gudjonsson.

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young hero's quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Edne's novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes.

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: An English cartographer travelling through 18th century Eastern Europe loses his way in bad weather and finds shelter in a village whose people are living in fear of a mysterious evil force that surrounds the area. Will building a moat around their homes protect them from the malevolent entity, or is it already in their midst? Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Flemyng, Charles Dance and Aleksey Chadov.

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has been working alone at an energy-generating base on the moon for three years and desperately longs to return home. After he is injured in an accident, he begins to discover the disturbing truth about the operation he is running, and is forced to question his own identity. Sci-fi drama, starring Sam Rockwell, with the voice of Kevin Spacey.

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.

programme.title: Dark Signal
programme.desc: A murdered girl's spirit returns with a message for the staff of a radio station. Horror, starring Siwan Morris, Gareth David-Lloyd, Joanna Ignaczewska and Duncan Pow.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A couple move into a new apartment, and the husband forms a close friendship with their elderly neighbours. The wife soon becomes pregnant, and starts to suspect her spouse has been seduced into a Satanic cult, who have sinister plans for her baby. Roman Polanski's horror, based on the novel by Ira Levin, and starring Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Oscar-winner Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer and Ralph Bellamy.

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: An English cartographer travelling through 18th century Eastern Europe loses his way in bad weather and finds shelter in a village whose people are living in fear of a mysterious evil force that surrounds the area. Will building a moat around their homes protect them from the malevolent entity, or is it already in their midst? Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Flemyng, Charles Dance and Aleksey Chadov.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: A mysterious, planet-sized energy cloud is heading for Earth, destroying everything in its path. Admiral James T Kirk returns to the bridge of the Enterprise to stop the invader, but he has to contend with a bitter rival and the possession of one of his crew by the alien force. Sci-fi adventure, the first movie based on the TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Persis Khambatta.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew faces a bitter battle to the death with an old enemy. Khan, a genetically engineered superhuman tyrant, has escaped exile on a barren planet and hijacked a starship to take his revenge on Admiral Kirk, while also scheming to turn an experimental planet-creating device into a doomsday weapon. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, Ricardo Montalban and Kirstie Alley.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: A mysterious, planet-sized energy cloud is heading for Earth, destroying everything in its path. Admiral James T Kirk returns to the bridge of the Enterprise to stop the invader, but he has to contend with a bitter rival and the possession of one of his crew by the alien force. Sci-fi adventure, the first movie based on the TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Persis Khambatta.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew faces a bitter battle to the death with an old enemy. Khan, a genetically engineered superhuman tyrant, has escaped exile on a barren planet and hijacked a starship to take his revenge on Admiral Kirk, while also scheming to turn an experimental planet-creating device into a doomsday weapon. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, Ricardo Montalban and Kirstie Alley.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Admiral Kirk and his crew hijack the decommissioned Enterprise to recover the body of their fallen comrade Mr Spock from the planet Genesis. Kirk has learnt that Spock's spirit is still alive, and the Vulcan can be resurrected, but he must also battle a Klingon captain determined to control the planet's mysterious energy. Sci-fi sequel, directed by Leonard Nimoy, with William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Christopher Lloyd.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: A dull American town in the middle of the desert is suddenly attacked by huge man-eating subterranean creatures. Luckily, two dimwitted but brave handymen step into the breach to lead a ragtag bunch of locals and a mismatched pair of survivalists in the battle against the gruesome worm-like monsters. Comedy horror, with Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross, Reba McEntire and Bobby Jacoby.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Admiral Kirk and his crew hijack the decommissioned Enterprise to recover the body of their fallen comrade Mr Spock from the planet Genesis. Kirk has learnt that Spock's spirit is still alive, and the Vulcan can be resurrected, but he must also battle a Klingon captain determined to control the planet's mysterious energy. Sci-fi sequel, directed by Leonard Nimoy, with William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: White Noise: The Light
programme.desc: A man tries to commit suicide following the murder of his family. Although close to death, he is revived and discovers he now has the ability to predict when others are about to die. Using his new-found psychic skill to save lives, he learns too late the dire and unforeseen consequences of his well-intentioned meddling. Horror, starring Nathan Fillion and Katee Sackhoff.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew travels back in time to prevent an alien probe destroying the Earth. The only thing that can avert the disaster is a humpback whale, a creature extinct in the 23rd century - but adjusting to life back in 1986 proves a distinct challenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Leonard Nimoy, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: The Starship Enterprise races to the rescue of intergalactic ambassadors held hostage on a distant planet. The crisis proves to be the handiwork of a renegade Vulcan mystic who kidnaps Captain Kirk and his crew, ordering them to fly to an unexplored world where he hopes to fulfil his insane ambition - to meet God. Sci-fi adventure, written, directed by and starring William Shatner, with Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and David Warner.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.desc: Captain Kirk is framed for the assassination of the Klingon head of state just as the Federation is about to make peace with their old enemies. As Kirk and Dr McCoy are banished to an icy prison planet, Spock tries to uncover the identity of the real killers. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, Christopher Plummer, with appearances by Christian Slater and Michael Dorn from Star Trek: The Next Generation.(n)

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: Minutes before boarding a rollercoaster with her friends, a high-school graduate has a premonition they will all die and persuades them to get off the ride - just before it crashes. However, death seems intent on catching up with them, as one by one they meet a gruesome end. Horror sequel, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Ryan Merriman, Kris Lemche, Alexz Johnson and Sam Easton.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew travels back in time to prevent an alien probe destroying the Earth. The only thing that can avert the disaster is a humpback whale, a creature extinct in the 23rd century - but adjusting to life back in 1986 proves a distinct challenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Leonard Nimoy, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan.(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: A retired police detective and his family break down taking a short cut on a remote road and later find themselves attacked by savage and deformed victims of a nuclear testing project. Remake of the 1970s horror, starring Kathleen Quinlan, Aaron Stanford, Vinessa Shaw, Ted Levine, Emilie de Ravin and Dan Byrd.(n)

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A successful doctor is shocked to discover his wife once harboured feelings for another man and resolves to get even by embarking on an affair of his own - only to end up involved with a dangerous exclusive cult. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Sydney Pollack and Marie Richardson.

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: A cop embarks on his first day in narcotics, partnering a seasoned officer whose willingness to flout the rules forces him to question everything he has learnt. As they resort to extreme measures to crack a case, the rookie is left battling his conscience in a dangerous situation. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn and Tom Berenger.

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Bad Words
programme.desc: Jason Bateman directs and stars in this dark comedy about a 40-year-old misanthrope who enters children's spelling contests. With Kathryn Hahn, Rohan Chand and Philip Baker Hall.

programme.title: The Burning
programme.desc: A mysterious man attempts to rescue a young woman who has been kidnapped by the mercenaries who murdered her father and took control of his farm. Argentinean Western drama, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Alice Braga and Claudio Tolcachir.

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: A slave trained to fight as a gladiator turns against his masters and leads an army of rebels in a fight for freedom against the Roman state. But as the rebellion gathers momentum, two senators do all they can to exploit the uprising for their own political ends. Stanley Kubrick's Oscar-winning epic, with Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Laurence Olivier, Jean Simmons, Charles Laughton and Peter Ustinov.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: A hitman takes the chance to combine his latest assassination job with a trip back to his home town for a school reunion. The occasion starts to get complicated when an old flame turns up and rekindles their lost romance - while a rival killer harasses him to join an assassins' union. Black comedy drama, starring John Cusack, Minnie Driver, Dan Aykroyd, Joan Cusack and Alan Arkin.

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: A suburban family man has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with a friend of his teenage daughter. Struggling to cope with the unhealthy attention her father is lavishing on her friend, the girl begins a tentative relationship of her own, while her harassed mother is also having an affair. Sam Mendes' Oscar-winning black comedy drama, starring Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Mena Suvari and Wes Bentley.

programme.title: Warsaw 44
programme.desc: A factory worker in Nazi occupied Poland joins a resistance movement. He finds himself torn between two very different women, but all three of them will be drawn into a growing conflict as the approach of the Soviet army inspires the rebels to launch a climactic battle against their oppressors. Second World War drama, starring Jozef Pawlowski and Zofia Wichlacz. In Polish and German.

programme.title: Welcome to New York
programme.desc: A powerful French businessman maintains an empire that influences the fate of nations, while concealing dangerous sexual appetites. During a business trip to New York, he spends the evening with a number of prostitutes, but finds his seemingly invincible status falling apart when he is accused of assault. Drama, starring Gerard Depardieu and Jacqueline Bisset.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic.

programme.title: Birth
programme.desc: A widow has managed to put her husband's death behind her, only to find her world turned upside down by an encounter with a mysterious 10-year-old boy who claims to be the reincarnation of her departed spouse. A strange bond develops between them when she finds herself unable to get the child's story out of her head. Mystery, starring Nicole Kidman, Cameron Bright, Lauren Bacall and Danny Huston.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai.

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A journalist is driven to the brink of suicide by a smear campaign after he attempts to expose the CIA's alleged involvement with Contra rebels in Nicaragua and the importing of cocaine into California. Fact-based drama set during the 1990s, starring Jeremy Renner, Rosemarie DeWitt and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: The Greatest Show on Earth
programme.desc: A circus owner hires a celebrated trapeze artist to perform with his girlfriend as the star attraction - leading to bitter rivalry in the air and sexual tension on the ground. Meanwhile, a clown tries to keep his past a secret, and racketeers prepare to muscle in on the concessions. Cecil B DeMille's Oscar-winning drama, starring Charlton Heston, Cornel Wilde, Betty Hutton and James Stewart.

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A lonely student finds her first year at university in New York a disappointing experience, with uninspiring studies and no social life. Everything changes when her mother remarries and she acquires a new stepsister, whose bizarre schemes draw her into the kind of lifestyle she had always dreamed of - and provide fresh creative inspiration. Comedy, starring Lola Kirke and Greta Gerwig.

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck boxing coach nurses a grudge because his best fighter has abandoned him for the big time. When a 31-year-old waitress turns up asking him to train her, he refuses outright. However, her persistence wins him round and the pair go on to form a strong professional partnership and successful career. Oscar-winning drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Hilary Swank, Morgan Freeman and Anthony Mackie.

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A Philadelphia cop is assigned to protect an Amish boy who was the only witness to a murder. Discovering the killers are rogue policemen willing to go to any lengths to cover up their crime, he is forced to go into hiding within the Amish community, experiencing a clash of cultures and unexpected feelings for the boy's widowed mother. Thriller, directed by Peter Weir, with Harrison Ford, Kelly McGillis, Lukas Haas and Danny Glover.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford.

programme.title: A Tale of Love and Darkness
programme.desc: Historical drama based on the memoir of acclaimed writer Amos Oz, exploring the founding of the state of Israel and a young writer's relationship with his mother. Written, directed by and starring Natalie Portman, with Shira Haas.(n)

programme.title: Honeytrap
programme.desc: A Brixton teenager's misguided attempts to attract the attention of a heartless wannabe rapper have terrible results. Drama, starring Jessica Sula, Lucien Laviscount and Ntonga Mwanza.(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner.(n)

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai.(n)

programme.title: Battle for Sevastopol
programme.desc: A female Russian student becomes an expert sniper during the Second World War, regarded as a hero by her own people and a deadly threat by the German high command. In the later years of the war, she travels to the US, befriending Eleanor Roosevelt and spearheading a campaign to persuade America to join the Allies. Fact-based drama, starring Yuliya Peresild and Evgeniy Tsyganov. In Russian and English.(n)

programme.title: Tangerines
programme.desc: In the Apkhazeti region of Georgia in 1990, an Estonian man has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines, but when a wounded man is left behind, he is forced to take him in. Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian.(n)

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: During a freezing cold winter in the frozen woods of an isolated Maine logging town, a lapse of concentration has devastating consequences for a school bus driver. Drama, starring Amy Morton, John Slattery and Louisa Krause.(n)

programme.title: The Forgotten Kingdom
programme.desc: A young man reluctantly embarks on a journey to his ancestral land of Lesotho to bury his estranged father, and finds himself drawn to the mystical beauty and hardships of the people and the land he had forgotten. Drama, starring Zenzo Ngqobe, Nozipho Nkelemba and Lebohang Ntsane. In Southern Sotho.(n)

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton.(n)

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: Two brothers have tended a herd of sheep together for 40 years, but never speak to each other. When a disease outbreak prompts the government to impose a cull on livestock, they put their differences aside to protect their animals - each using his own unusual methods. Drama, starring Sigurdur Sigurjonsson and Theodor Juliusson. In Icelandic.(n)

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: In a future run by a genetically enhanced elite, a caretaker who was born unmodified is barred from all but the most menial jobs. He swaps identities with a former athlete who has lost the use of his legs in an accident, allowing him to realise his dream of joining the space programme. However, a murder investigation threatens to expose his deception. Sci-fi drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman and Jude Law.(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang.(n)

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Mann's thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A repressed ballet dancer leads a sheltered life, devoted entirely to her art. She pursues the lead role in a production of Swan Lake, but the director convinces her she will only be capable of dancing the part if she embraces her darker impulses. This leads her into a destructive relationship with a rival that threatens her sanity. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Natalie Portman. With Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel and Winona Ryder.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: An ageing hard-bitten rancher expects his two sons to follow in his footsteps and keep order in their lawless land with the force of the gun. One of his boys is a gentle soul with no appetite for violence, but his brother is trigger-happy and one day takes a step too far - leaving his father with an impossible decision. Western, starring Van Heflin, Tab Hunter and James Darren.

programme.title: Short Circuit
programme.desc: A military robot is struck by lightning and develops a mind of its own. The machine embarks on a series of comic misadventures, but the company that made him want him back. He realises his only hope is to convince the scientist who invented him that he really is alive. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Steve Guttenberg, Ally Sheedy and Fisher Stevens.

programme.title: The House of Magic
programme.desc: A stray cat wanders into a magician's mansion, and finds it is full of strange gadgets. The illusionist allows him to stay, to the annoyance of his other pets, but the cat proves an invaluable addition to the group when their owner's scheming nephew plots to take the house for himself. Animated adventure, with the voices of Murray Blue and Doug Stone.

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: A bemused schoolboy is escorted on a bizarre journey through time by a group of larcenous dwarfs. His adventures lead him to encounters with various characters from history - but none of them are quite what he had imagined. Terry Gilliam's fantasy comedy, starring Craig Warnock, David Rappaport, John Cleese, Michael Palin, Sean Connery, Ian Holm, Ralph Richardson and David Warner.

programme.title: The Way Way Back
programme.desc: An introverted teenager joins his mother and her overbearing boyfriend on an awkward family holiday. He befriends a free-spirited employee at the nearby water park, and the relationship inspires him to assert his independence for the first time. Comedy drama, starring Liam James, Sam Rockwell, Steve Carell, Toni Collette and Allison Janney.

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: An old man tells a journalist the story of his youth as a lobby boy at a hotel in Eastern Europe in the 1930s. He was taken under the wing of the establishment's dashing concierge, and is drawn into his misadventures as he becomes involved in a conflict over a valuable painting. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Ralph Fiennes, Tony Revolori, F Murray Abraham and Jude Law.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: A Soviet sniper becomes a national hero during the Second World War Battle of Stalingrad, so the Germans enlist a crack marksman of their own to deal with him. A lethal contest of wits follows as the two sharpshooters stalk each other, while the Russian also finds himself caught up in a love triangle with one of his friends. Drama, starring Jude Law, Ed Harris, Rachel Weisz, Joseph Fiennes, Bob Hoskins and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Beginners
programme.desc: A man starting a relationship looks back on the last years of his father's life, when he came out as gay at the age of 75. He recalls the old man's passionate new outlook on life, and ponders what the experience can teach him about his current romance. Comedy drama, starring Ewan McGregor and an Oscar-winning Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: My Darling Clementine
programme.desc: Retired lawman Wyatt Earp accepts the post of Tombstone city marshal when one of his brothers is killed by cattle rustlers, and embarks on a crusade to bring his murderers to justice and drive lawlessness from the streets. Western, directed by John Ford, starring Henry Fonda, Victor Mature, Linda Darnell and Walter Brennan.

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the American Civil War, two Confederate soldiers are offered a way out of jail. Their former comrades-in-arms are now a gang of bandits terrorising Arizona, and the two prisoners are sent to infiltrate the group and bring them to justice. Western, starring Audie Murphy, Buster Crabbe, Ben Cooper and Gloria Talbott.

programme.title: 23 Paces to Baker Street
programme.desc: A blind playwright overhears a conversation in a London pub concerning a kidnapped child. He goes straight to the police, but they dismiss his story as the product of an overactive imagination, forcing him to take matters into his own hands. With the help of his fiancee and secretary, he sets out to rescue the child and catch the crooks - but his only clue is the scent of a distinctive perfume. Thriller, with Van Johnson, Cecil Parker, Patricia Laffan and Vera Miles.

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: An American infantry lieutenant fighting in German-occupied Belgium is convinced an inept but well-connected officer is not fit for command. When his unit are wiped out after another of the officer's mistakes, the lieutenant miraculously survives and returns to base seeking revenge. Second World War drama, starring Jack Palance, Eddie Albert, Lee Marvin, Buddy Ebsen and Robert Strauss.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A rich high-school student uses all her charm and financial clout to boost an awkward new pupil's image, but soon finds she has created a monster - while her own popularity suffers in the process. Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd.

programme.title: Belle
programme.desc: Premiere. The illegitimate mixed-race daughter of a Royal Navy admiral is raised in the household of her great uncle, but is never entirely accepted in Georgian British society. She falls in love with an idealistic lawyer, and together they campaign against the slave trade. Fact-based period drama, starring Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Tom Wilkinson and Emily Watson.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: The Wind Rises
programme.desc: Hayao Miyazaki's animated biopic of Japanese aviation engineer Jiro Horikoshi. Unable to fulfil his dream of becoming a pilot, Horikoshi becomes an innovative designer of aircraft in the 1920s, living through some of the most turbulent times in the country's history. To his horror, his creations are put to destructive use in the Second World War. With the voices of Hideaki Anno and Miori Takimoto. In Japanese, German, French and English.(n)

programme.title: Drums Along the Mohawk
programme.desc: Settlers find the dream of starting a new life in a remote valley threatened when the American War of Independence breaks out. They soon come under threat both from British forces and a Mohawk tribe angry at intruders in its territory. John Ford's historical drama, starring Henry Fonda and Claudette Colbert.(n)

programme.title: The Lawless Breed
programme.desc: A gunslinger newly released from prison tells the story of his eventful life to a newspaper reporter in the hope of salvaging his brutal reputation. Fact-based Western, starring Rock Hudson and Julie Adams.(n)

programme.title: The Battle at Apache Pass
programme.desc: Apache chief Cochise resolves to make a treaty allowing his people to live in peace with white settlers. However, his hot-headed fellow leader Geronimo disagrees, and puts the negotiations at risk by embarking on a murder spree, incurring the wrath of his enemies. Western, with John Lund, Jeff Chandler and Susan Cabot.(n)

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: A luxury cruise liner at sea on New Year's Eve is struck by a freak tidal wave, which leaves it capsized and several passengers and crew trapped. A rebellious priest realises the ship is sinking fast, and leads a band of survivors up through the vessel in search of a way to the surface. Disaster movie, starring Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters, Leslie Nielsen and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller directed by the late Curtis Hanson, with Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn and Joseph Mazzello.(n)

programme.title: East Is East
programme.desc: Pakistani chip shop owner George Khan tries to keep his seven unruly children under control in 1970s Salford. Revelling in the pleasures of adolescence, the flares-wearing youngsters seem determined to ignore his moral advice - but a shock is in store for two of his teenage sons in the shape of arranged marriages. Comedy drama, starring Om Puri, Linda Bassett, Jimi Mistry and Archie Panjabi.(n)

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: An ambitious district attorney takes on what he believes to be an open-and-shut case - prosecuting a wealthy man who has confessed to shooting his wife, leaving her in a coma. But when the defendant arranges to represent himself in court, he proceeds to meticulously tear apart the evidence against him. Thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins and Ryan Gosling.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason looks to develop his musical skills further by applying to win a scholarship for the Klineberg Conservatory.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa wins a raffle, but Grandma is upset to learn that his prize is a statue which reminds him of one of his ex-girlfriends.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura's decision to accept a temporary teaching job in a nearby town prompts Almanzo to realise she's not a child any more - forcing him to finally confront his feelings for her. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert and Dean Butler.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The death of Adam's father jeopardises plans to build a new school for the blind in Walnut Grove. Almanzo proposes to Laura, but she is heartbroken when Charles forbids them to marry until she is 18. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert, Michael Landon and Dean Butler.

programme.title: Within These Walls
programme.desc: A tenacious nun working in a high security women's prison realises the inmates need something to focus on - and sets out to persuade officials to allow the jailbirds to help train dogs for the disabled. Drama, starring Laura Dern, Ellen Burstyn and LaTanya Richardson.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben tries to win the attention of a special girl, but his attempts backfire miserably as she goes running into the arms of Jason.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia begin preparations for their 20th wedding anniversary, and John-Boy falls in love with an older woman.

programme.title: A Walton Thanksgiving Reunion
programme.desc: The family battles a host of personal and romantic problems at a gathering in celebration of Thanksgiving, but also takes advantage of the holiday as an ideal chance to draw strength from one another. Drama based on the TV series, starring Richard Thomas, Ralph Waite, Michael Learned and Ellen Corby.

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano.

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.

programme.title: In the Arms of a Killer
programme.desc: A rookie homicide cop lands herself in a dilemma after making the foolish mistake of becoming romantically involved with the prime suspect in a drug-related murder case. Thriller, starring Jaclyn Smith, John Spencer, Michael Nouri, Nina Foch and Sandahl Bergman.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: Engaging espionage adventure about a suave and courageous Navy officer assigned to pose as his own double - a renowned counterfeiter - in an effort to expose a gang of ruthless crooks. But his daring leaves him in trouble when he discovers he's under suspicion of double-dealing from all sides. Michael Craig, Julia Arnall and Brenda de Banzie star.

programme.title: The Good Times Are Killing Me
programme.desc: A successful lawyer from Washington DC, Kate Derby, collapses and falls unconscious as she travels to London to gather information for a case. When she awakens, she is in a secured drug and alcohol rehab facility, and is convinced she has been framed by the man she is mounting a case against. Inside, she befriends a couple of strange characters, who help her crack an important case. Drama, starring Kelly Rowan and Rupert Graves.

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben tries to win the attention of a special girl, but his attempts backfire miserably as she goes running into the arms of Jason.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia begin preparations for their 20th wedding anniversary, and John-Boy falls in love with an older woman.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Laura buries herself in her work at the blind school in an attempt to get over the pain of her lost love - but is unexpectedly reunited with Alamanzo.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Laura announces her marriage to Almanzo, but the path ahead is strewn with financial difficulty. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert.

programme.title: Blue Valley Songbird
programme.desc: A talented singer-songwriter's love of country music provides her with a means of escaping the clutches of her abusive manager-boyfriend and starting a new life. Drama, starring Dolly Parton, John Terry, Billy Dean and Kimberley Kates.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is rushed to hospital with pneumonia, leaving the rest of the family to cope with their financial hardship.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Caroline are shocked to discover Mary has accepted a proposal of marriage, but reluctantly give their consent. Pioneering drama, starring Michael Landon.

programme.title: The Audrey Hepburn Story
programme.desc: Part one of two. Biopic of the glamorous Hollywood star, with Jennifer Love Hewitt as the sophisticated actress who took America by storm in the 1950s and 1960s thanks to roles in Funny Face, Breakfast at Tiffanys and My Fair Lady. With Frances Fisher and Eric McCormack.

programme.title: No One Would Tell
programme.desc: A shy teenager thinks all her dreams have come true when the school's star athlete asks her out. However, the relationship soon turns sour as her seemingly perfect boyfriend becomes possessive, controlling and violent. Drama, starring Fred Savage, Candace Cameron Bure, Gregory Alan Williams and Rodney Eastman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy receives a visit from cousin Homer, but the Baldwin sisters are unaware of his criminal record until he makes off with much of the stock for their reunion banquet recipe.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Lord Is My Shepherd - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jealous of Charles' attention for his new son, Laura longs for her father's affections and refuses to pray for her baby brother to get well when he falls ill.

programme.title: Working Miracles
programme.desc: A janitor wakes from a coma to discover he has gained the life-changing ability to heal people just by touching them. He soon becomes a minor celebrity, but the gift takes its toll on his health and relationship with his fiancee. Drama, starring Eddie Cibrian, Lisa Sheridan and Darcy Rose Byrnes.

programme.title: A Touch of Hope
programme.desc: A man discovers he has the abilities of a faith healer. Initially reluctant, he agrees to use his gift to help doctors, but only in emergency cases. However, many in the medical community are suspicious of his claims, a conflict that comes to a head when he is asked to bring a doubting doctor's daughter out of a coma. Fact-based drama, starring Anthony Michael Hall, CCH Pounder, Abraham Benrubi and Fay Masterson.

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: The bodies of two men closely linked with troubled Strathclyde FC are discovered clutching red cards. Investigations into the club's affairs reveal financial irregularities and illicit relations between the notorious manager and a number of the players' wives - and as further red cards are issued to others involved in the running of the club, Jardine's team work against the clock to nail the killer before he strikes again. Crime drama, starring James MacPherson, Blythe Duff and John Michie.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is rushed to hospital with pneumonia, leaving the rest of the family to cope with their financial hardship.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy must stand in for the town minister while he is away on honeymoon, but fears he has nothing profound to say.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Laura returns Almanzo's ring but his sister Eliza comes up with a cunning rescue plan. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Trying to start a new life after Alice's death, Jonathan and his son Andy move to Sleepy Eye to establish a freight business.(n)

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy must stand in for the town minister while he is away on honeymoon, but fears he has nothing profound to say.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mr Edwards is responsible for bringing a deadly fever to Walnut Grove, resulting in the terrified citizens being placed in quarantine to prevent further spread.(n)

programme.title: The Audrey Hepburn Story
programme.desc: Concluding the biopic of the glamorous Hollywood star, with Jennifer Love Hewitt as the sophisticated actress who took America by storm in the 1950s and 1960s thanks to roles in Funny Face, Breakfast at Tiffanys and My Fair Lady. With Frances Fisher and Eric McCormack.(n)

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: Engaging espionage adventure about a suave and courageous Navy officer assigned to pose as his own double - a renowned counterfeiter - in an effort to expose a gang of ruthless crooks. But his daring leaves him in trouble when he discovers he's under suspicion of double-dealing from all sides. Michael Craig, Julia Arnall and Brenda de Banzie star.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After meeting an itinerant singer, a restless Mary Ellen decides to run away from home. However, when he does not take kindly to her following him, she disappears again and is left up to John-Boy to find her. Meanwhile, the rest of the family works hard picking apples to save enough money to send her on a trip to Washington to cure her wanderlust.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Lord Is My Shepherd - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Ingalls family is delighted by the birth of a new baby boy, Charles Fredrick. Laura becomes jealous and refuses to pray for her new brother's good health. The young boy dies soon afterwards and she is racked with guilt.(n)

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes.(n)

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano.(n)

programme.title: Held Hostage
programme.desc: A bank manager and her daughter are kidnapped by three masked men, who tape explosives to them. The terrified mother is ordered to rob her own bank or the bombs will be set off. She manages to inform a colleague of her predicament, only to end up accused of being a willing accomplice. Thriller, starring Julie Benz and Brendan Perry.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: Jardine and the team investigate a series of mysterious deaths among members of a tango club, and uncover a connection with an unsolved robbery. Meanwhile, as Reid's wedding approaches, Ross tries to convince her that she is rushing into marriage too quickly.(n)

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama. A couple search for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Kevin Dillon, Edward Asner and Dixie Carter.(n)

programme.title: Ride to Freedom: The Rosa Parks Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the life of Rosa Parks, the black woman who famously refused to give up her seat on a bus to a white man in 1950s America. The action prompted a massive outpouring of anger and sparked the rise of the civil rights movement. Angela Bassett, Cicely Tyson and Peter Francis James star.

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: The Academy Awards(R) for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay went to this gritty war drama about a psychologically unglued bomb removal expert plying his trade in Iraq while his crew becomes increasingly unnerved by his cowboy recklessness. Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: Carrie returns home to the US with Franny to work as an advocate for Muslim Americans.�Dar and Saul brief President-elect Keane.�Quinn struggles with his new circumstances. Season premiere(c)

programme.title: The Affair: 308
programme.desc: An unexpected cause to celebrate provokes a sobering realization in Alison. Soon after, a startling warning leaves her pondering the unthinkable. Cole's frustrations with Alison come to a head, revealing a radical truth

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: During World War I, a disparate group of young American adventurers comes to France to fight for the Lafayette Escadrille, a volunteer squadron of pilots battling the forces of fascism in the years before their country entered the war. James Franco, Martin Henderson, Tyler Labine, Jean Reno and Jennifer Decker star in this stirringly patriotic salute to forgotten heroes

programme.title: 2016 Playoff Week 2
programme.desc: This week on INSIDE THE NFL, host James Brown and expert analysts Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason and NY Jet Brandon Marshall discuss Green Bay QB Aaron Rodgers plus, Antonio Brown's live stream of Steelers coach Mike Tomlin's speech(c)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure

programme.desc: A young man is stalked by a serial killer who supposedly died decades ago

As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub

programme.title: Bubble Boy

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: A dentist (Dane Cook) who is also a lifelong bachelor suddenly realizes at an ex-girlfriend's wedding that every woman he's ever slept with has found her true love with the very next man she dated - making him instant catnip to ladies only interested in benefiting from his "curse." Jessica Alba and Dan Fogler costar in this romantic comedy

programme.title: American Wedding
programme.desc: Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan star in this sequel to the classic American Pie comedies - as a couple of high-school sweethearts who need to get married in a hurry, before the groom's grandmother kicks the bucket. Also stars January Jones and Eugene Levy

programme.title: High School
programme.desc: The day after valedictorian Henry Burke (Matt Bush) tries marijuana for the first time, his school principal (Michael Chiklis) institutes mandatory drug tests for all students. Henry has two options: fail and lose his college scholarship, or team up with his stoner friend Travis (Sean Marquette) to beat the system. After all, if everyone fails the drug test, then no one will be expelled, right? Adrien Brody co-stars in this pot comedy

programme.title: Nas: Time Is Illmatic
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the making of Nas' 1994 groundbreaking debut album Illmatic that follows the artist as he returns to his childhood home to share stories of his upbringing and influences and tracks the thrilling evolution from his life as a young street poet to a visionary MC. Features interviews with his musical peers, including Pharrell Williams and Alicia Keys and the "Illmatic" producers

programme.title: Bloodworx
programme.desc: When two college friends sign up for a pharmaceutical test to make some quick cash, they find themselves in a remote hospital facility in the grips of a deadly government experiment

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award� nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Aleah
programme.desc: A pregnant 17-year-old girl turns to the violent streets of New York after her abusive mother and boyfriend her abandon her, in this short film created by 16-year-old Brooklyn writer Nialani Pringle and acclaimed director Laurie Collyer

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award� winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: Lenny Cooke
programme.desc: In an era when high school stars were forgoing college hoops in favor of the multi-million dollar contracts promised in the NBA draft, Lenny was supposed to be the next superstar. But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach
